sentences.sContent: Lack of space forbids listing the names of all those who contributed.
sentences.sCn: 由于篇幅限制，无法列出所有捐款人的姓名。

remMethod.val: for + bid(命令) → 为了命令而阻止 → 阻止

words.tran: 被禁止的；严禁的，禁用的
令人生畏的；严峻的；险恶的

trans.tranCn: 禁止；不准；不允许；〈正式〉严禁
trans.tranOther: to tell someone that they are not allowed to do something, or that something is not allowed
